++was taken away from me..Her uncle is hades, he abused her way too much,  She was made to work for him, one day she came to my home, to steal something, she fell down and hurt, she was in a lot of panics..i held her and found out i was lied too and she is my daughter" steve++ https://t.co/DPBMTwJJq2

++they didn't let me see her....i asked my mother in law about her, they told me, it's really bad, she is infeted by a virus i can't go to her and say the last good bye to her, she passed away.. After that I was heartbroken, I never spoke about it to anyone, My baby my life++

++daughter, I went shopping for her even before she was born. The day of her birth, her mom walked out on me, she didn't want me to be an avenger, she wanted me to join the dark side. i said no.. she left me, and i was told that my daughter is in a bad state my baby girl++

++know, she was alive until now. You see I was married once, I fell in love with a woman...her name was hayley. turns out she was a dark witch, she promised me she'd stay by us and so did my mother in law.. promised.. one day I was so happy that I was gonna be a dad to a ++

Solo (Bucky meeting Marley)~
One day bucky and Steve were out together and after that, he said him "...Buck...I have a daughter..''
Bucky was suprised and shocked to hear this "you have a daughter? and no one knows about this! you didn't tell me?"

+nothing will change that," he'd help her out , clean up her wounds and changed her into some better clothes "thank..... you.. steve... i mean daddy..thank you..'' https://t.co/1x5kotN8M3

++ her tears came "you said... i love you..i have never ever heard these words.. before....why did you say them to me?.after all ihave done bad things.." 
he knelt down "no, i mean them i thought i lost you.. you're back you're my life, you're part of the avengers family  ++ https://t.co/e9ZzPSnRuK

++so bad and send you in lots of pain.. and make your life miserable.....and i didn't know.. that makes me a bad person.. a villain.."
steve hugged and kept her in his grasp "I'll deal with them and you're never going back ever..you're safe here i love you forever and always++

''honey no..... I was told you died.. and I was heartbroken mommy left us both. uncle hades ruined it all. you work for hades? you're never going to work for him ever again, i thought i lost you forever, and found you."
she said to him with a crying face "i wanted to hurt you++ https://t.co/yCn5pqztva
